hero.subtitle: Whether you're an experienced agent, property owner, or real estate enthusiast, Yakout offers the tools, network, and support you need to succeed in Morocco's dynamic real estate market.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: We're revolutionizing real estate in Morocco by connecting people with their dream properties through innovation, trust, and exceptional service.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to Morocco's real estate market by providing a transparent, efficient, and user-friendly platform that empowers both buyers and sellers to make informed decisions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted and innovative real estate platform in Morocco, setting new standards for digital property transactions and customer experience.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Transparency, integrity, innovation, and customer-centricity guide everything we do. We believe in building lasting relationships based on trust and mutual success.

benefits.title: Why Choose Yakout?
benefits.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their real estate careers with our comprehensive platform and dedicated support.

network.title: Extensive Network
network.description: Connect with over 2,000 verified agents and access a database of 50,000+ properties across Morocco's major cities and emerging markets.

platform.title: Advanced Platform
platform.description: Leverage cutting-edge technology including virtual tours, AI-powered matching, and comprehensive analytics to stay ahead of the competition.

growth.title: Career Growth
growth.description: Access exclusive training programs, certification courses, and mentorship opportunities to accelerate your professional development.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Get dedicated assistance from our expert team, including marketing support, legal guidance, and technical help whenever you need it.

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from real estate professionals who have transformed their careers with Yakout.

items.name: Fatima El Mansouri
items.content: Joining Yakout was the best decision I made for my career. The platform's advanced tools and extensive network helped me increase my sales by 300% in just one year.

items.name: Ahmed Benali
items.content: Yakout's comprehensive platform and professional support made it easy to showcase my luxury properties to serious buyers. The quality of leads is exceptional.

items.name: Sophia Martinez
items.content: As a foreign investor, Yakout provided me with the local expertise and market insights I needed to make successful property investments in Morocco.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about joining our platform.

items.question: What does it cost to join Yakout?
items.answer: We offer flexible membership plans starting from basic free access to premium subscriptions with advanced features. Our commission structure is competitive and transparent, with no hidden fees.

items.question: Do I need a real estate license to join?
items.answer: While having a real estate license is preferred for agents, we welcome property owners, developers, and real estate enthusiasts. We also provide guidance on obtaining proper certifications.

items.question: What training and support do you provide?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive onboarding, regular training sessions, marketing materials, legal support, and 24/7 customer service. Our team is dedicated to your success.

items.question: How quickly can I start listing properties?
items.answer: Once your application is approved and you complete our quick onboarding process, you can start listing properties immediately. Approval typically takes 24-48 hours.

final_cta.title: Start Your Success Story Today
final_cta.subtitle: Join Morocco's fastest-growing real estate community and unlock unlimited opportunities in the dynamic property market.

modal.title: Apply as an Agent
modal.subtitle: Join our network of successful real estate professionals and start your journey with Yakout.

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.subtitle: Thank you for your interest in joining Yakout.
success.message: We've received your application and will review it within 24-48 hours. Our team will contact you with next steps.
